review: I like the bit where the birds start attacking people. This idea has been copied ever since

title: Plane
review: I like the bit where he lands a plane in the middle of the Hudson river

title: Wow
review: I like the bit with the dinosaurs. I hope they don't get out. Whoops. I'm sure it won't happen again

title: It's a film about dodgeball
review: I like the bits where they throw balls at each other. Especially when they hit people in the face. Sometimes they throw wrenches too

title: Keep em coming
review: Easily the best FATF. I like the bit with the cars

title: Classic
review: I like how they hid the gun BEHIND the cistern in the restaurant
